metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6135 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Multiple NSS NIST curves were susceptible to a side-channel attack known as"Minerva". This attack could potentially allow an attacker to recover theprivate key. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 121.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
nss: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
